doc.title: Fenomena
doc.plot: A Malaysian born British woman goes back to Terengganu where she spent her early years as a child. Upon her arrival, she seeks her family's old gardener who also doubles as a spiritual healer in the hope that he might be able to help her. She meets his family and his young granddaughter who has a hole in her heart and soon forgets about her own suffering whilst trying to help her new friend get through hers.BY: madjanssen
